name: A Shared Cup of Tea - Hibiscus' Tea Shop
name_original: A Shared Cup of Tea - Hibiscus' Tea Shop
description:
Use SPACE to interact with Hibiscus and talk!

POV: You're Etsuko and you're going to Hibiscus' tea shop to walk home together after a long day of work! Wait for her for the incredible 2 minutes of gameplay!

A Shared Cup of Tea is a continuous piece of fiction that's everything from written novel to visual novels and now also a "small interactive experience"!

Background song is "a vision" by LilyPichu/comfi beats! (thanks for making it copyright free <3 <3 <3)


17.11.21: A few things weren't implemented due to this being homework for Code Coven's Introduction to Game Making class and being due! I hope that I will add these missing features in the future!
